title: Ne morem odpreti facebooka
content: Star aem 91 let in na znam angleško. Firefox uporabljam že več kot 20 let,sedaj pa sem nekaj zabrkal in ne morem odpreti facebooka. Besedilo zahteva pomagajte nam sokazati da sem to jaz,nima pa okenca ,da bi kliknil, da sem to jaz. Prijavljen nem na račun viktor.pintaric@triera.net tel. 070 623 802. Prosim, da mi pomagate v slo jeziku.

title: Opening an Image with discord causes Firefox to automatically download the image. How to stop?
content:
Since i've switched defaults to Firefox, every time I 'Open Link' on a discord image, Firefox downloads the image immediately instead of simply opening the image in the browser.

I would like to disable the automatic downloading of the image and instead simply open the image in the browser. How do I make this happen?
creator: gavinthebear2000

title: Security Warning on Firefox When Visiting Gatwick Taxi Website?
content: I tried to open the Gatwick Airport Taxi site using Firefox, but I received a security warning. Just wondering if anyone else has experienced this and whether it’s something to be concerned about or just a browser-specific issue.
creator: brent55

title: Firefox not loading certain websites properly
content:
Hi there, I've been experiencing a recurring issue with Firefox recently. Some websites, especially tools and SEO-related platforms like www.buybestseotools.com, aren’t loading correctly—they either show a blank page or take too long to respond.

I've tried clearing the cache, disabling extensions, and even running Firefox in Troubleshoot Mode, but the problem persists. These same websites load just fine in Chrome and Edge.

Is there a setting or recent update that could be causing this compatibility issue in Firefox? Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks!
creator: t46470819

title: Frequent Prompt to Sign in When Access SharePoint Online
content: I'm using Firefox in MacBook. When i'm accessing SharePoint site and any link related to SharePoint, i'm frequently get the prompt to sign in my Microsoft 365 account. i didn't face this issue when using Chrome or Edge. IT Team try to set conditional access from Microsoft to allow persistent token, it work well for Chrome but seems Firefox didn't take effect. Any help can guide me to reduce the frequent prompt to sign in?

title: Search Bar not Honoring Bookmark (*) and History (^) Abbreviations
content:
The Address Ba" apparently honors abbreviations of * (for search within Bookmarks only) and ^ (for search within History only). Just about every reference, in Firefox Help, seems to equate the Search Bar with the Address Bar. So, I would expect that the Search Bar would honor said abbreviations. But, it does not. Isn't it supposed to?

Configuration: Firefox Desktop, v138.0.4
